name: 服务监视情况
source_query:
--water/water::
select count(*) num 
from `water_reg_service` 
where is_enabled=1 
AND (check_last_state=1 OR check_last_time < unix_timestamp(SUBTIME(NOW(),'0:1:0')))
alarm_exp: 预警：有{{m.d[0].num}}个服务异常（或服务监测出错）

name: 定时任务监视
source_query:
--water/water_paas::
select count(*) num 
from luffy_file 
where plan_state = 8 and is_disabled=0
alarm_exp: 预警：定时任务异常数量监视::{{m.d[0].num}}
